code: export var TOGGLE_SELECTED_STATE='TOGGLE_SELECTED_STATE';export var FILTER_PRODUCTS='FILTER_PRODUCTS';export var ADD_ALL_PRODUCTS='ADD_ALL_PRODUCTS';export var toggleSelectedState=function toggleSelectedState(key){return{type:TOGGLE_SELECTED_STATE,payload:key};};export var filterProducts=function filterProducts(text){return{type:FILTER_PRODUCTS,payload:text};};export var addProductsWithAPI=function addProductsWithAPI(payload){return{type:ADD_ALL_PRODUCTS,payload:payload};};
